transArray.content: I have basically never stayed in a hotel in Beijing. With the recent epidemic, I am worried that it will affect my familyâ€™s ability to stay in hotels. Although this hotel is a budget hotel, the details are still considerate, and breakfast is more suitable for my appetite. Maybe the waiter thought I was positive? I was given half a box of mineral water. Although I may not be far from the sun, I still express my gratitude, haha. I originally wanted to stay a few more days, but my family is sick and there is no need for me to come out and stay...

Hello dear guest! Thank you for your recognition of the service attitude of our friends at Orange Beijing Wukesong Hotel. Your encouragement is very important. If life is a journey, we are willing to be your warmest stop. If meeting is a ballad, we are willing to be your wisp. Happy note, I want you to write your mood in notes. Friends, I look forward to meeting you next time at Orange Beijing Wukesong Hotel. I wish you all the best! Manager: Zhao Dan
